CHK_CONTACT.name: CHK_CONTACT
CHK_CONTACT.description: Check the contact of USB plug

enumeratedValues.name: NO_CHECK
enumeratedValues.description: Do not check the contact of USB plug.

enumeratedValues.name: CHECK
enumeratedValues.description: Check whether the USB plug has been in contact with each other

enumeratedValues.name: CHECK
enumeratedValues.description: Check whether a charger (either a dedicated charger or a host charger) is connected to USB port.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_CHECK
enumeratedValues.description: Do not check whether a charger is connected to the USB port.

BVALID.name: BVALID
BVALID.description: Indicates VBus is valid for a B-peripheral

AVALID.name: AVALID
AVALID.description: Indicates VBus is valid for a A-peripheral

PLUG_CONTACT.name: PLUG_CONTACT
PLUG_CONTACT.description: State of the USB plug contact detector.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_CONTACT
enumeratedValues.description: The USB plug has not made contact.

enumeratedValues.name: GOOD_CONTACT
enumeratedValues.description: The USB plug has made good contact.

CHRG_DETECTED.name: CHRG_DETECTED
CHRG_DETECTED.description: State of charger detection. This bit is a read only version of the state of the analog signal.

enumeratedValues.name: CHARGER_NOT_PRESENT
enumeratedValues.description: The USB port is not connected to a charger.

enumeratedValues.name: CHARGER_PRESENT
enumeratedValues.description: A charger (either a dedicated charger or a host charger) is connected to the USB port.

DM_STATE.name: DM_STATE
DM_STATE.description: DM line state output of the charger detector.

DP_STATE.name: DP_STATE
DP_STATE.description: DP line state output of the charger detector.

HS_USE_EXTERNAL_R.name: HS_USE_EXTERNAL_R
HS_USE_EXTERNAL_R.description: Use external resistor to generate the current bias for the high speed transmitter

EN_DEGLITCH.name: EN_DEGLITCH
EN_DEGLITCH.description: Enable the deglitching circuit of the USB PLL output.
